data.quote: I came, I saw, I conquered.
data.author: Julius Caesar

data.quote: Experience is the teacher of all things.
data.author: Julius Caesar

data.quote: Cowards die many times before their actual deaths.
data.author: Julius Caesar

data.quote: It is better to create than to learn! Creating is the essence of life.
data.author: Julius Caesar

data.quote: Men in general are quick to believe that which they wish to be true.
data.author: Julius Caesar

data.quote: As a rule, what is out of sight disturbs men's minds more seriously than what they see.
data.author: Julius Caesar

data.quote: If you must break the law, do it to seize power: in all other cases observe it.
data.author: Julius Caesar

data.quote: It is easier to find men who will volunteer to die, than to find those who are willing to endure pain with patience.
data.author: Julius Caesar

data.quote: The greatest enemy will hide in the last place you would ever look.
data.author: Julius Caesar
